original_title: Dear Diary: The Story of Two Women In Love
overview: Recovering from a breakup, rock-singer Kate (Jo-Ann Barton) falls in love with her computer teacher Bonnie (Mary De Michele). Kate goes through a maze of emotional highs and lows, and throughout it all, Kate's manager, Marty (Deana Demko), drives everyone crazy protecting her. To add to the turmoil, Marty constantly battles with Kate's roomate David (Lou Pennacchio).  Follow Kat and Bonnie's most intimate thoughts through the pages of the diaries. Strong musical performances wrapped in a compelling drama where a misunderstanding results in tragedy.
tagline: Share their intimate thoughts...their fears...their hopes...their desires
title: Dear Diary: The Story of Two Women In Love
